comments:
Hi, 
I use the IBM jdk 1.4.2 for PPC and got following exception if I try to change
the build path. Maybe bug 104664 is relevant to this problem. At least it
resolved the same exception.

Error 2005-10-10 10:38:54.578 An internal error occurred during: "Setting build
path".
java.lang.IllegalStateException: zip file closed

I should mention that this problem doesn't occur with 3.1.0.

Closing as WORKSFORME.
Reopen if you get it again.
